title: Psychopedia
subtitle: Psychometrics Wiki
details: Psychometrics wiki designed for educational purposes.
Aims to democratize access to psychometric knowledge.
Includes interactive features for data visualization and analysis.

title: Psychometric
subtitle: Psychometrics Library
details: NPM library designed for use by Psychometricians, Psychologists, and others.
Incorporates various psychometric formulae for streamlined workflows.
Supports modern JavaScript frameworks with TypeScript compatibility.

title: BetterJS
subtitle: JavaScript Library
details: NPM library extending JavaScript's native prototypes.
Provides utility methods to simplify complex operations.
